text: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Sã'a bã zã ta zo mana ba." Ka ce: "Kayya! Na rantse da Ubangijĩna, lalle, zã ta zõ muku." Masanin gaibi, gwargwadon zarra bã ta nĩsanta daga gare Shi a cikin sammai kuma bã ta nĩsanta a cikin ƙasã, kuma bãbu mafi ƙaranci daga wancan kuma bãbu mafi girma fãce yanã a cikin Littãfi bayyananne
